japanese: ねえねえ、フータロー君？
translation: Hey, hey, Futaro-kun?

japanese:
……その顔はなんだ。
女優がそんな顔していいのか？
translation:
...What's with that face?
Is it okay for an actress to make such a face?

japanese: ちょうどいいところに来てくれましたねぇ。
translation: You came at just the right time.

japanese: 四葉まで……。
translation: You too, Yotsuba...

japanese:
（これは、面倒くさい話が
　始まりそうな予感がひしひしと……）
translation:
(I have a feeling this is going to be
 a troublesome conversation...)

japanese:
ちょっと気になってたことがあってさ。
四葉と２人で話してたんだけど、
答え合わせをよろしく。
translation:
There was something I was curious about.
Yotsuba and I were talking, so let's check the answer.

japanese: なんの答え合わせだ。
translation: What answer are you checking?

japanese:
ズバリ聞いちゃいます！
シュノーケリングを提案したのは
五月のためだったんですね？
translation:
I'll ask you straight out!
You suggested snorkeling for Itsuki's sake, right?

japanese: うっ……。
translation: Ooh...

japanese: ピンポーン！　正解！
translation: Ding ding ding! I'm correct!

japanese: 自分で言うな！
translation: Don't say it yourself!

japanese: でも正解でしょ？
translation: But it's the right answer, isn't it?

japanese:
……どうしてわかった。
別にこっちも隠してたわけじゃねぇけど。
translation:
...How did you know?
It's not like we were hiding it or anything.

japanese:
シュノーケリングが終わったあとの
２人の話を聞けば、嫌でもわかっちゃいますよ。
translation:
Well, if you listen to the conversation
between the two of you after snorkeling,
you can't help but know.

japanese:
あと、運動が苦手な君が、
シュノーケリングを提案したのも
やっぱり引っかかってたんだよね。
translation:
Also, since you're not good at exercise,
suggesting snorkeling gave it away.

japanese:
（なるほど。
　まあ俺も、もし三玖が提案してきたら
　どうしてだって思うしな）
translation:
(I see. Well, I would have wondered why
 if Miku had suggested it.)

japanese: こっちの都合で決めちまって悪かったな。
translation: Sorry for deciding based on my own circumstances.

japanese:
いえいえ！
恋人のしたいことですもん、最優先でいいんですよ！
translation:
Oh no, no!
It's okay for a lover
to prioritize what they want to do!

japanese: お、おう……。
translation: O-okay...

japanese:
むしろ姉としては安心だよ。
なかなか恋人らしくなったね。
translation:
Actually, as her big sister, I'm relieved.
You're starting to act more like a couple.

japanese: うんうん、姉としては安心です。
translation:
Yep, yep.
As her big sister, I'm relieved too.
Big sister...

japanese: 私も姉ですよ！？
translation: I'm her big sister too, you know?!

japanese:
一花はともかく、お前も五月の姉だってのは
たまに忘れそうになる。
translation:
As for Ichika,
I sometimes forget
that you're also Itsuki's older sister.

japanese:
ええー！？　なんでですか！
私はこんなにも妹のことを思っているのに！
translation:
Whaaa?! Why is that?
I think about my little sister all the time!

japanese:
ま、年長者はそういうもんだよな。
俺もらいはのことは常に心配してる。
translation:
Well, that's just how it is for older siblings.
I'm always worried about Raiha too.

japanese:
うん、そういうものだよね、
お姉ちゃんお兄ちゃんって。
translation:
Yeah, that's just how it is
with older sisters and brothers.

japanese: しっかし、フータロー君も大変だよねぇ。
translation: But, Futaro-kun has it tough too, huh?

japanese: は？　なんだ急に。
translation: Huh? What do you mean all of a sudden?

japanese:
だって、彼女に妹想いな姉が４人もいるんだよ？
彼氏は苦労するでしょ。
translation:
I mean, you have four sisters who are all so fond
of their little sister's boyfriend, right?
That boyfriend must have a hard time.

japanese:
苦労させる気かよ。
勘弁してくれ。
translation:
Are you trying to make it hard for me?
Give me a break.

japanese:
うーん、それは君の行い次第？
もしかすると……ふふふ～。
translation:
Hmm, it all depends on your actions, you know?
Perhaps... Teeheeheeee.

japanese: その笑い怖ぇよ！
translation: That laugh is scary!

japanese:
気をつけてくださいね～？
私たちはいつだって五月の味方ですから。
translation:
Please be careful, okaaay?
We'll always be on Itsuki's side.

japanese:
……改めて思ったが、五月って末っ子っなんだよな。
あまりイメージないが。
translation:
...Come to think of it, Itsuki is the youngest.
I don't have much of an image of that though.

japanese:
いまはそうかもしれないけど、
実はね、昔はお母さんにべったりで
末っ子っぽかったんだよ？
translation:
Even though it still might be true,
Itsuki-chan used to be really attached to our Mom,
and seemed like the youngest even back then.

japanese:
私たちだってお母さんのことは大好きだけど、
五月は特に離れたがらなかったよねー。
translation:
We all love our mom, but especially Itsuki
didn't want to be separated from her.

japanese:
更にお父さんもいるんだよな。
どう考えても大変どころの騒ぎじゃないんだが。
translation:
There's also your dad. 
It's definitely not just a small commotion,
no matter how you look at it.

japanese:
あはは……。
お父さんは私たちより強敵ですもんね。
translation:
Ahaha...
Dad is a tougher opponent than us, after all.

japanese:
そんなに怖がらなくても。
お父さんだって普通の人間だよ？
translation:
Don't be too scared.
Dad is just a regular human being, you know?

japanese:
そう、普通の人間なんだよ。
娘を可愛がってる普通の父親なんだ。
だからこそ手強い。
translation:
Yeah, he's just a regular guy.
A father who loves his daughters.
That's what makes him a formidable opponent.

japanese: ……なるほどね。
translation: ...I see what you mean.

japanese:
だったら、フータロー君も普通に、
正攻法でぶつかっていくしかないでしょ。
translation:
In that case, you have no choice but to confront him
head-on in a normal way, Futaro-kun.

japanese: ああ、それしかねぇんだけどな。
translation: Yeah, that's all I can do.

japanese:
……改めて思ったが、五月って末っ子っなんだよな。
あまりイメージないが。
translation:
...Come to think of it, Itsuki is the youngest.
I don't have much of an image of that though.

japanese:
いまはそうかもしれないけど、
実はね、昔はお母さんにべったりで
末っ子っぽかったんだよ？
translation:
Even though it still might be true,
Itsuki-chan used to be really attached to our Mom,
and seemed like the youngest even back then.

japanese:
私たちだってお母さんのことは大好きだけど、
五月は特に離れたがらなかったよねー。
translation:
We all love our mom, but especially Itsuki
didn't want to be separated from her.

japanese:
別に、大変とは思わねぇけどな。
むしろ俺は幸せだと思ってる。
translation:
I don't really think it's a big deal, though.
I actually think I'm lucky.
Huh...

japanese:
お前らが五つ子でよかった。
４人で五月や俺を支えてくれたからこそ、
いまの俺たちがあるんだ。
translation:
I'm glad you all are quintuplets.
We are who we are today because the four of you supported
Itsuki and I.

japanese:
ふふっ！
君、五月ちゃんと同じこと言ってる。
translation:
Teehee!
You're saying the same thing as Itsuki-chan.

japanese:
ねー。
２人は似たもの同士です。
translation:
Right-?
The two of you are really alike.

japanese:
それに、冗談のつもりだったんだけど
真面目に返されると照れちゃうなぁ。
translation:
Besides, I was only just kidding.
I get embarrassed when people take me seriously.

japanese:
な、なんだよ言い出しといて。
俺は本当にそう思ってんだぞ？
translation:
Wh-what, you said it, so deal with it.
I actually meant what I said, you know?

japanese:
うひゃー！
もう勘弁してくださーい！
translation:
Uuugh!
Please spaaare uuus!

japanese:
……改めて思ったが、五月って末っ子っなんだよな。
あまりイメージないが。
translation:
...Come to think of it, Itsuki is the youngest.
I don't have much of an image of that though.

japanese:
いまはそうかもしれないけど、
実はね、昔はお母さんにべったりで
末っ子っぽかったんだよ？
translation:
Even though it still might be true,
Itsuki-chan used to be really attached to our Mom,
and seemed like the youngest even back then.

japanese:
私たちだってお母さんのことは大好きだけど、
五月は特に離れたがらなかったよねー。
translation:
We all love our mom, but especially Itsuki
didn't want to be separated from her.

japanese: へえ、そんな時期があったのか。
translation: Oh, so there was a time like that, huh?

japanese:
おや？　興味津々？
そんなに恋人の過去が知りたいのかな～？
translation:
Oh? Are you interested?
You want to know about your lover's past that badly?

japanese: べっ……別にそうじゃねぇし。
translation: It...it's not like that.

japanese: じゃ、この話はおしまいでーす。
translation: Okay then, that's the end of the story.

japanese: おう、構わないぞ。
translation: Sure, I'm fine with that.

japanese:
（……本当は割と聞きたい。
　くっ、変な意地を張っちまった！）
translation:
(...Actually, I'm quite curious.
 Ugh, why am I being so stubborn!)

japanese: 昔のことよりも、大事なのは未来ですもんね。
translation:
What's more important than the past
is the future, right?

japanese:
五月と上杉さんが
これからどんな未来へと進んで行くのか。
そのほうが重要です。
translation:
What kind of future will Itsuki and Uesugi-san
move towards? That's more important.

japanese: ……うん。
translation: ...Yeah.

japanese:
よし！
それじゃ、フータロー君には
未来のことを聞かせてもらおうかな。
translation:
Alright!
Then let's ask Futaro-kun about the future.

japanese: は？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
五月ちゃんとの同棲はいつ頃から？
大学卒業後？
translation:
When will you start living together with Itsuki-chan?
After graduating from university?

japanese: ど、同棲ってお前！？
translation: Wh-what are you talking about?!

japanese:
その点は私も気になりますねぇ。
さあ、上杉さんの考えを聞かせてください！
translation:
I'm curious about that too.
So, please tell us your thoughts, Uesugi-san!

japanese: よ、四葉まで……！
translation: E-even Yotsuba...!

japanese: ほらほら、教えて？
translation: Come on, come on, tell us?

japanese:
……未来も大事だが！
やっぱ一番大事なのはいまだよな！
translation:
...Well, the future is important!
But the present is still the most important thing!

japanese:
せっかく沖縄まで来てビーチにいるんだ！
ほら、遊ぼうぜ！
translation:
We came all the way to Okinawa
and we're at the beach! Let's play!

japanese: あ、逃げた。
translation: Ah, he ran away.

japanese: 待ってくださーい、上杉さーん！
translation: Wait for me, Uesugi-saaan!
